name: This Urchin Kitq
description:
GMTK 2020 Game Jam Game

Kitq is the cute pet that can be only controled by the fate. 

He is out of your control! Still you can have fun, and watch how Kitq explores the world, and encurage him to get little more curious about things around him!

Experiment, explore and watch cute Kitqs life.

No more words! Go and play with this Urchin Kitq!

Sounds, music, graphics (:< ), animations, level design (:< ) and design: Bart

Code and design: Milap
